[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1459859399026{padding-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ title_align=”center” subtitle_color=”dark-gray” sep_color=”green” title=”Admissions Process” sep_enable=”true” subtitle_enable=”true” subtitle_font_size=”18px” subtitle_margin_b=”43px” sep_margin_b=”52px”]We are currently accepting applications for Grades 4 through 10 for
the 2016—17 academic year.[/stm_title][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1455093758686{padding-bottom: 60px !important;}”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_icon_box view_style=”style-4″ icon_type=”svg” icon_position=”left” icon_color=”green” title=”Request Info” descr=”You will receive a confirmation email with login, password and instructions needed to our online application.” button_enable=”true” step_enable=”true” step_number=”1″ step_number_size=”120px” step_number_color=”#f8f8f8″ button_text=”Request Info” button_link=”url:%23||” icon_size=”61px” css=”.vc_custom_1457102880025{margin-right: -10px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” svg_id=”2833″ svg_animated=”true”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_icon_box view_style=”style-4″ icon_type=”svg” icon_position=”left” icon_color=”green” title=”Apply” descr=”After October 1, you may login and complete your online application using the credentials emailed to you.” button_enable=”true” step_enable=”true” step_number=”2″ step_number_color=”#f8f8f8″ button_text=”Apply Online” button_link=”url:%23||” icon_size=”61px” css=”.vc_custom_1457102888645{margin-right: -5px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;margin-left: -5px !important;}” svg_id=”2835″ svg_animated=”true”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_icon_box view_style=”style-4″ icon_type=”svg” icon_position=”left” icon_color=”green” title=”Submit” descr=”Enter payment information and $100.00 application fee. The form is submitted, you will receive an email confirmation.” button_enable=”true” step_enable=”true” step_number=”3″ step_number_color=”#f8f8f8″ button_text=”Submit Form” button_link=”url:%23||” icon_size=”61px” css=”.vc_custom_1457102898022{margin-left: -10px !important;}” svg_id=”2836″ svg_animated=”true”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1455094182246{padding-top: 38px !important;padding-bottom: 36px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ sep_color=”green” title=”Eligibility” sep_enable=”true”][/stm_title][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-5″][stm_title title_tag=”h4″ title_font_weight=”400″ title=”Academic Standing” title_margin_b=”37px”][/stm_title][vc_column_text]You will receive a confirmation email with login code, password, and instructions needed to complete our online application. By mail, you will also receive an admissions packet with additional materials including video instructions

You will receive a confirmation email with login code, password, and instructions needed to complete our online application. By mail, you will also receive an admissions packet with additional materials including video instructions[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4″][stm_title title_tag=”h4″ title_font_weight=”400″ title=”Extracurricular Activities” title_margin_b=”37px”][/stm_title][vc_column_text]After October 1, you may login and complete your online application using the credentials sent to your email:

  • Online application will be available after October 1, 2015
  • Deadline: January 15, 2016 for grades 9—10
  • Deadline: January 22, 2016 for grades 4—8

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3″][stm_single_image img_id=”1121″ img_size=”181×265″ img_responsive_enable=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1460723569110{margin-bottom: 17px !important;}”][stm_btn_simple btn_size=”size-custom” btn_icon_position=”right” btn_icon_size=”5px” btn_icon_hspace=”6px” btn_link=”url:%23||” btn_link_text=”Download Prospectus” btn_icon_enable=”true” btn_custom_text_size=”13px” btn_custom_padd_l=”19px” btn_custom_padd_r=”16px” btn_custom_height=”36px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1455094143076{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 38px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column][stm_title title_tag=”h2″ sep_color=”green” title=”Contact our Deans of Admissions” sep_enable=”true” sep_margin_b=”50px”][/stm_title][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-5″][stm_contact_person img_id=”1020″ name=”Ms. Samantha Turlington” question=”For the Foundation Stage contact” tel=”+1 998 71 150 30 20″ email=”emb@stylemixthemes.com” css=”.vc_custom_1455093949317{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”][stm_contact_person img_id=”1022″ name=”Mr. Oliver Sherwood” question=”For the Prep School please contact” tel=”+1 998 71 150 30 21″ email=”prep@stylemixthemes.com” css=”.vc_custom_1455094011142{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-7″]

    [/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
